package.name: @choice-ui/error-message
package.description: An error message component for displaying validation errors in form fields and UI elements

stories.name: Basic
stories.description:
Basic error message usage.

Use the `ErrorMessage` component to display validation errors for form fields.

stories.name: Disabled
stories.description:
Disabled error message.

Use the `disabled` prop to match the disabled state of form fields.
stories.source:
import { ErrorMessage } from "@choice-ui/error-message" export default function App() { return (
This field has an error but is disabled.
); }

stories.name: With Validation
stories.description:
Interactive validation example.

Shows how to conditionally display ErrorMessage or Description based on validation state.
